snippet: At least 18 people died early Saturday in a stampede as tens of thousands of members of a Muslim sect gathered to mourn the death of their spiritual leader in Mumbai.
abstract: At least 18 people die in a stampede as tens of thousands of members of a Muslim sect gather to mourn the death of their spiritual leader in Mumbai, India.
lead_paragraph: At least 18 people died early Saturday in a stampede as tens of thousands of members of a Muslim sect gathered to mourn the death of their spiritual leader in Mumbai.

headline.main: India: 18 Die in Stampede in Mumbai
headline.print_headline: India: 18 Die in Stampede in Mumbai
